Question
========

Two nurses (vpk1 and vpk2) measure 41 patients' heart rates in close each other's heart rates. The results are shown in the attached scatterplot. The spread width ("range") of the values of vpk2 is equal to:

![](uva-scatterplot-1217-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 46
* 56
* 61
* 107

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 46: Incorrect
* 56: Incorrect
* 61: Correct
* 107: Incorrect
